meanings.definition: Not characteristic of a gentleman; lacking in qualities of a gentleman.
meanings.sent1: His unkempt appearance and loud behavior were quite ungentlemanly.
meanings.sent2: It is ungentlemanly to speak with your mouth full at the dinner table.
meanings.sent3: The ungentlemanly behavior of the clown at the party made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her ungentlemanly driving style on the road was like a wild horse running free.
meanings.sent5: The ungentlemanly conduct of the bully left a lasting impression on the school.

meanings.definition: Behaving in a rude or disrespectful manner.
meanings.sent1: His ungentlemanly remarks towards the waiter were uncalled for.
meanings.sent2: It is ungentlemanly to interrupt someone while they are speaking.
meanings.sent3: The ungentlemanly way he cut in line caused a commotion.
meanings.sent4: Her ungentlemanly behavior towards her classmates was like a storm in a teacup.
meanings.sent5: The ungentlemanly treatment of the elderly by the young man was truly disappointing.
